suppress.notes:
file name: spring-security-core-5.2.1.RELEASE.jar
This suppresses a false-positive identifying Spring 5.2.1 as 5.0.5 for a CVE related to the use of method security. In addition, method security is not used in this project. https://github.com/jeremylong/DependencyCheck/issues/1827

file name: nimbus-jose-jwt-7.8.jar
This requires upgrade of Spring Boot to version later than 2.2.2.RELEASE (when released), that uses spring security 5.3.0 where nimbus-jose-jwt is upgraded to version 7.9 (this version fixes the CVE).
